DOC.detailed_description: 40 normal weight 40 overweight kindergarden elementary school child participate study . Anthropometric measurement : weight , height , BMI BMI percentile measure calculated participant . The participant take part two non-exercise activity 'sport health center child adolescence ' . The amount composition food plate assess weigh photography eat analysed report macronutrient consumption dietitian . The meeting normal weight child separate overweight child .
